holidays.title: Fool's Paradise Day
holidays.description: Strip away your fears, and let yourself fall into a world of peace and happiness.

holidays.title: Gruntled Workers Day
holidays.description: Look at the glass half full and spread positivity around work by celebrating this holiday.

holidays.title: International Skinny Dip Day
holidays.description: Get naked, feel the water, and jump in as we celebrate International Skinny Dip Day.

holidays.title: National Barbershop Music Appreciation Day
holidays.description: We have all the information you need — party ideas, interesting facts, and a little history lesson.

holidays.title: NATIONAL BEANS ‘N’ FRANKS DAY
holidays.description: Today is Beanie and Weenies’ Day. Get ready to eat a lot of them.

holidays.title: National Delaware Day
holidays.description: Join us to celebrate Delaware and the spirit of American independence this July 13.

holidays.title: National Rock Day
holidays.description: Today we delve into rocks, what makes them so special and why we celebrate them.

holidays.title: Sovereignty Day of Montenegro
holidays.description: Dabble in the joy of freedom with local food and the cultural extravaganza of Montenegro.

holidays.title: Caleb Logan LeBlanc’s Birthday
holidays.description: This former YouTube star’s nicknames were Wheels and Baked Potato. Let’s learn more about his life.

holidays.title: Harrison Ford’s Birthday
holidays.description: This veteran actor described Han Solo as “the great rapscallion of the universe.”

holidays.title: MF DOOM’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this late rapper-songwriter, having his “Gladiator” mask on controls the narrative.

holidays.title: Patrick Stewart’s Birthday
holidays.description: We don't take this movie icon's five decades of pure undiluted entertainment for granted.

holidays.title: Wyatt Oleff’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young actor is slowly but surely establishing himself in the entertainment industry.
